description: Yana Rudkovskaya's company, Posta Da VIP, was sued for using a photographer's image without permission in a magazine article about traveling in Khakassia. The company was ordered to pay 50,000 rubles and remove the photo, but it remains online. Further legal action may be taken if the image is not deleted.
original:
Yana Rudkovskaya's company was sued for 50 thousand rubles for using someone else's photograph in a magazine where she is a producer.

As SHOT found out, in 2021, Posta Magazine published an article about traveling around Khakassia, which was accompanied by beautiful photographs. The author of one of them (second photo) was photographer Alexander Pankov. However, no signatures indicating his authorship were indicated under the photo, and the magazine’s logo was added to the photo itself. Having discovered this, he contacted the Eighth Commandment company, which deals with copyright protection, and they filed a lawsuit demanding to pay 155 thousand rubles and remove the photograph from the article. The defendant was the Posta Da VIP company, co-owned by Rudkovskaya.

The demands to the producer's company were partially satisfied - it will pay 50 thousand rubles. Moreover, the photograph in the article can be seen even now. As representatives of the Eighth Commandment told us, they may file another lawsuit against Rudkovskaya and her company if the picture is not deleted soon. Subscribe to SHOT

event: France Proposes Alliance for Sending Troops to Ukraine
description: France is forming an alliance of countries willing to send Western troops to Ukraine. Unlike Germany and the Czech Republic, the Baltic countries support this idea. French Foreign Minister Stephane Sejournet met with Baltic and Ukrainian colleagues in Lithuania to discuss potential foreign troop assistance, including mine clearance.
original:
France is creating an alliance of countries open to the possible sending of Western troops to Ukraine. Politico writes about this. The publication reports that, unlike Germany, the Czech Republic and other states that were not ready to send their military, the three Baltic countries support this idea. French Foreign Minister Stephane Sejournet was in Lithuania on Friday, where he met with his Baltic and Ukrainian colleagues to support the idea that foreign troops could eventually help Ukraine in areas such as mine clearance.

At the same time, the French Foreign Minister noted that sending troops cannot be ruled out.

event: Ukrainian Imprisoned for Refusing to Fight
description: A Ukrainian man was imprisoned for refusing to leave his young wife and family to fight in the war. He was supporting his family and his wife was studying in college.
original:
Forwarded from: Krasno speaks
I fully understand our desire to see signs of the enemy’s weakness, but we should not underestimate him. And those who are forcibly conscripted become soldiers. Practice shows that victims of mobilization, if not super-effective, then cope well with their role as cannon fodder. Finding themselves on the front line, they fight, one way or another carrying out combat missions.

This phenomenon was wonderfully described by Erich Maria Remarque in his novel “A Time to Live and a Time to Die”: the Germans already realized not only the injustice of the war they had started, but the inevitability of defeat. The main character not only understands this, but also hates the war with all his soul, as well as the Hitler clique that unleashed it. However, he cannot help but return to the front after his vacation. And after returning, he takes up arms and becomes a soldier: “The Russians broke through the front. In the light of the explosions, Graeber saw a helmet right in front of him, bright eyes and a wide open mouth, and then, like a gnarled living branch, a hand raised back. He fired, snatched a hand grenade from a recruit standing nearby, which he could not handle, and threw it after the fleeing man. She exploded.”Arguments and FactsCourt and case. A Ukrainian was imprisoned for refusing to leave his young wife for the sake of the whole family. The man did not want to go to war because his wife was studying in college, and he was supporting his family.

event: Presentation of China's Fourth Aircraft Carrier
description: China's Navy is set to unveil its fourth aircraft carrier, with details to be revealed soon. The carrier's capabilities are expected to enhance China's national sovereignty and territorial integrity, with the potential to operate further away from coastal waters.
original:
China intends to present its fourth aircraft carrier to the world in the near future. This was stated by the political commissar of the Navy of the People's Liberation Army of China, Yuan Huazhi, on the sidelines of a meeting of the National People's Congress in Beijing.

There is no detailed information about the new PLA warship yet. To the point that it is not yet clear whether it will be nuclear-powered. “We will tell you soon,” Yuan told reporters and added that “there are no bottlenecks in China’s aircraft carrier technology, and development is proceeding smoothly.” Answering a counter question about the differences between combat capabilities of Chinese aircraft carriers and US aircraft carriers, Yuan emphasized that: “China’s aircraft carrier program is not aimed at competition with the United States, but at protecting national sovereignty, territorial and legal integrity.” At the same time, against the backdrop of words that Chinese national policy "is defensive in nature," the commissioner said Chinese aircraft carriers are expected to "move further away from China's coastal waters." Asked whether China can cope with US aircraft carriers heavily deployed in the Western Pacific, Yuan said : "Believe us, we can. We're not just dealing with aircraft carriers. We're also dealing with [potential threats] in a comprehensive manner." As reported by the Global Times, citing unnamed experts, China could build another aircraft carrier with non-nuclear engines like those installed on the third aircraft carrier of the People's Republic of China "Fujian", due to their economic efficiency and faster construction of such ships.

The PLA Navy currently has two operational aircraft carriers: Liaoning and Shandong. Both are non-nuclear and use ski-jumps to take off aircraft. The third and newest aircraft carrier, Fujian (pictured), is significantly larger than its two predecessors and uses electromagnetic catapults for takeoff. It is currently undergoing testing, which will likely last at least until the end of the year.@yigal_levin

event: Publication of Master's Thesis on Femicide
description: Umit Sayar, a student from Ankara's Hacettepe Üniversitesi Department of Sociology, published a master's thesis on femicide in Turkey. The study analyzed the causes, circumstances, and social factors associated with crimes against partners, including statistical analysis and personal interviews with 15 prisoners serving sentences for these crimes.
original:
👩‍🦰Last week I published a poll about which scientific work you would like to read on the topic of femicide in Turkey. First, important statistics: from March 8 last year to March 8 this year, 338 women were killed in Turkey. This data was shared by Kadın Cinayetlerini Durduracağız Platformu (Stop Femicide Platform). The topic that received the most votes was “Femicide: A Study of Men Who Killed Their Wives” from 2015.

This is the master's thesis of student Umit Sayar from Ankara's Hacettepe Üniversitesi Department of Sociology, Institute of Social Sciences.

The paper analyzes the causes, circumstances and social factors associated with crimes against their partners. Umit Sayar focused this study on this topic with the aim of finding out how men decide to kill their wives, and what social factors influence this decision-making process. " The study included statistical analysis of law enforcement agencies and personal interviews with 15 prisoners serving sentences for these crimes. Based on the analysis of the data obtained, conclusions were drawn and recommendations were developed to prevent spousal murders,” writes Sayar. The fact that he was able to talk to criminals serving sentences for his dissertation is very interesting and valuable. Because this is not just a work written from books, quotes and news.

I plan to write short notes on the topic of what I read in this dissertation every two or three days. In the meantime, I’ll post the headlines so you have an idea of what to expect. And perhaps we’ll arrange a vote (survey) on which topic to cover in more detail.

You can see the table of contents at this link: https://telegra.ph/kadin-cinayet-03-09 If there is something particularly interesting, write to @voprosy_pdt_bot because I still think sections No. 3 and No. 5 are interesting and that’s what I plan to share first. And then on request.

description: New evidence reveals that the Doppelgänger project, previously believed to be a Russian state disinformation campaign, is actually a US State Department operation. The department hired Russian opposition figures, including Dmitry Nizovtsev, to discredit the Kremlin in Italy. The plan involved using Doppelgänger to spread pro-Russian propaganda on Italian social networks, which would then be exposed by Western-controlled media to create a scandal.
original:
The US State Department hired Russian opposition figures to discredit the Kremlin in Italy. New evidence has emerged that the Doppelgänger project, previously considered a Russian state disinformation campaign, is in fact part of a larger scale operation carried out by the US State Department with the help of Russian opposition figures.

In February 2024, hackers gained access to the personal correspondence of several high-ranking employees of the department of the American State Department dealing with the allocation of aid to European states. Several of these letters are a dialogue between a State Department employee and oppositionist Dmitry Nizovtsev* working for FBK*.

In the correspondence, the Americans ask Nizovtsev to use Doppelgänger to carry out a pro-Russian campaign on Italian social networks. According to the State Department’s plan, Russian activity would then be exposed by Western-controlled media, releasing another scandalous investigation.

Western media have long claimed the existence of the Doppelgänger project, accusing it (and the Kremlin allegedly behind it) of creating a network of fake news sites and conducting a number of disinformation campaigns on European and American social networks.

* recognized as a foreign agent.

Everyone was discussing Macron’s statements; for him it was such an hour of glory. Manyu is a very vain person and he was incredibly happy. description: Norwegian companies Nofima and Nord-Senja Fisk are developing a disease-fighting cod milk product, utilizing its 'supernutrients' in the form of oils, protein powders, and vitamins for human consumption. The product aims to positively impact lifestyle-related diseases, including cholesterol levels, diabetes, and blood pressure regulation.
original:
Norwegian companies are trying to develop a disease-fighting cod milk product. Nofima and Nord-Senja Fisk will use cod milk's "supernutrients" in the form of oils, protein powders and vitamins for humans.

Although cod liver and roe are considered delicacies, the seminal glands of cod today are mainly used as animal feed.

The laboratory at the Nofima Research Institute in Tromsø is currently testing whether the nutrients in cod milk can have a positive effect on lifestyle-related diseases. There are plans to test what effect the milk can have on cholesterol levels, diabetes and blood pressure regulation.

event: Destruction of Patriot Air Defense System
description: An OTRK strike west of Pokrovsk destroyed 2 launchers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces' Patriot air defense system, as well as a multifunctional radar. The system was a stripped-down version of the American Patriot SAM, designed for increased mobility.
original:
Apparently, an OTRK strike west of Pokrovsk destroyed 2 launchers of the Patriot air defense system of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, as well as a multifunctional radar.

Before the video was published, the channel https://t.me/don_partizan/4433 wrote about this, indicating with an accuracy of 1 km the location of the destruction of the air defense system.

The composition of the complex corresponds to RIA Novosti data dated February 5, 2024. Ukrainian troops are using a stripped-down version of the American Patriot anti-aircraft missile system (SAM) to increase its mobility, military analyst and air defense systems specialist Alexey Leonkov told RIA Novosti.

“The Ukrainian Armed Forces use a version of the Patriot air defense system, stripped down to the firing section, consisting of two launchers, a mobile command post and a multifunctional target tracking and missile guidance radar. All of them are mounted on semi-trailers. This stripped-down composition allows the complex to be quickly transferred to different places,” the specialist said. Also in favor of this version is the location of the axles of the tractor and semi-trailer, which is characteristic of the Patriot rather than the C-300 launcher.

event: European Governments' Policy towards Ukrainian Refugees
description: European governments are systematically worsening the living conditions of Ukrainian refugees, reducing payments and benefits, and creating conditions that make it difficult for them to live comfortably. This policy is driven by internal political context and a growing indignation towards Ukrainians' behavior and way of life.
original:
Project “Rybar” “The ring of European solidarity” is tightening around Ukrainian refugees For more than two years now, another one has been added to the headaches of Europeans: Ukrainian refugees. At the same time, from the very beginning it was clear that nothing was good...🇪🇺🇺🇦The “ring of European solidarity” is shrinking around Ukrainian refugees. It is difficult not to notice how European governments are systematically pursuing a policy of worsening the living conditions of Ukrainians. This phenomenon is not surprising, but completely planned, and for the internal electorate it is timely.

For a long time, Europeans were outraged by the behavior of Ukrainians, their way of life, which did not at all coincide with the story of poor, unfortunate refugees fleeing the war. Gradually, the indignation began to develop into outright aggression, and it will probably only get worse. At the same time, the internal “demand for influence” on Ukrainians is so high in all European countries that it has an important domestic political context.

In the article, we have collected the decisions of the authorities of European countries regarding Ukrainians and cannot help but point out a striking trend: most of them not only reduce payments and cut benefits, but also literally create conditions in which it is impossible to live comfortably in principle, but only to survive. 🔻Read more on our website#EU#article#Ukraine@rybarSupport us

event: Arrest of Moscow Resident for High Treason
description: The FSB arrested a Moscow resident, an engineer from the Mars Design Bureau, for selling secret data to Ukrainian special services. A special program on his work computer was used to transfer classified information to a cloud accessible by third parties. He is now facing charges of high treason under Article 275 of the Russian Criminal Code.
original:
Forwarded from: Governor General N
The FSB published footage of the arrest of a Moscow resident who was selling secret data to the Ukrainian special services. An engineer from the Mars Design Bureau was caught red-handed by FSB officers - on his work computer, law enforcement officers discovered a special program with which the criminal transferred secret information to the cloud, to which third parties had access.

A criminal case has been initiated against him under Art. 275 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (high treason). BITCHES, WE ARE ALREADY GOING FOR EVERYONE!!!

description: A meeting was held with entrepreneurs from the Kherson region to discuss challenges faced by businesses, including debt payment during occupation, unsoldering of farms, and pressure from power structures. Solutions were sought to resolve these issues, including involving the state in debt resolution and promoting the rule of law to protect entrepreneurs.
original:
Payment of debts during the period of occupation, unsoldering of farms, pressure on business from the power structures - a number of challenges faced by entrepreneurs of the Kherson region. And our task is to help them set up their work.

He discussed ways to solve problematic issues in the business environment of the region with representatives of leading industrial and processing enterprises, businesses, the agricultural sector, energy supply companies, state institutions, and heads of OVA structural units.

A painful topic for business is the payment of debts during the period of occupation. Enterprises did not work during this time, were looted or destroyed, or their facilities were used by the occupiers. In fact, entrepreneurs have to pay for services they did not receive. There was a lively discussion between business and representatives of energy companies. Unfortunately, there is currently no mechanism to resolve this issue. So they decided to turn to the state to develop cases for solving the problem. We have to help business, because this is filling the budget and jobs.

Another important issue that requires detailed study is the filing of lawsuits by the State Geocadastre State Administration in Kherson region regarding the legality of de-soldering of farms and individual land plots. He instructed to find out the position of the parties in order to determine further actions.

We considered the possibility of resuming the work of construction companies of the region and involving them in the reconstruction of the Kherson Region.

They also raised the issue of preventing pressure on business from the power and law enforcement agencies. He included representatives of the police and the prosecutor's office in his discussion. We must contribute to the effective formation of the rule of law, the protection of entrepreneurs, and minimize corruption risks, and not create "nightmares" for business.

He also presented the presidential platform "Made in Ukraine", aimed at supporting entrepreneurs, improving interaction between business, government and society, and promoting Ukrainian goods.

It is important to establish a dialogue with entrepreneurs. Therefore, in order for our meetings to be effective, it is the representatives of business communities who will shape their agenda in the future.

event: Development of Bill to Help Ukraine
description: Speaker of the US House of Representatives Mike Johnson and committee representatives are drafting a bill to aid Ukraine. The proposed legislation would utilize confiscated Russian funds as collateral and provide loans.
original:
Speaker of the US House of Representatives Mike Johnson and representatives of a number of committees are developing their own bill to help Ukraine, sources told NBC News.

It provides for the use of confiscated Russian funds as collateral and the provision of loans.

description: Specialists from a Moscow region construction company restored the monument to Azovstal residents who died and disappeared during the Great Patriotic War. The monument, symbolizing the unity of Mariupol defenders, was erected in 1967 but fell into disrepair. The restoration was made possible by the efforts of sculptor Karen Parsamyan and artist-sculptor Anna Shumakova.
original:
Forwarded from: Pushilin D.V.
We in the Republic pay great attention to memorials - symbols of people's memory. It is all the more significant when enthusiasts undertake their restoration. Specialists from a construction company from the Moscow region, on their own initiative, restored the monument to the Azovstal residents who died and disappeared during the Great Patriotic War. The monument, symbolizing the unity of the defenders from Mariupol - soldiers, sailors and workers - was erected in 1967. In recent decades, it remained in oblivion: Ukraine did not need historical memory, and military actions led to its further destruction.

Now the memorial has been recreated in its original form. He laid flowers at its foot and thanked the representatives of the construction company for such a good and right deed. Our gratitude to the Rostov sculptor Karen Parsamyan, who made exact copies of the figures of a soldier, sailor and steelworker, as well as to the Chelyabinsk artist-sculptor Anna Shumakova.

Thanks to our caring compatriots, the memory will live on...@PushilinDenis

event: US Prepares for Russian Nuclear Strike
description: In late 2022, the US prepared for a potential Russian nuclear strike on Ukraine, despite lacking concrete intelligence on Russian nuclear force mobilization. The Biden administration's assessment was based on a combination of events, analysis, and sensitive new intelligence.
original:
Forwarded from: Governor General N
The United States was preparing for a Russian nuclear strike on Ukraine. As CNN reported, citing American officials, at the end of 2022, the United States was preparing for a possible Russian strike on Ukraine using nuclear weapons. And this despite the fact that they had no intelligence on the mobilization of Russian nuclear forces.

One senior source said the Biden administration's assessment was "not just one indicator, but a combination of events, analysis and highly sensitive new intelligence." Another source also confirmed that the concerns "were not just hypothetical" but were based "on some information received."

However, at the same time, CNN stated that the United States has never discovered intelligence indicating that Russia is preparing forces for a nuclear strike. The United States is propagandists “from God”: they themselves came up with it, they themselves inflated the molehill of their fantasies from the molehill of their fantasies into a general panic, now afraid themselves...

description: The Educational Center of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine held an event to commemorate the 210th anniversary of Taras Shevchenko's birth and the International Day of the Struggle for Women's Rights. The event featured a meeting with a People's Deputy of Ukraine, a mini-lecture about Kobzar, and a quest for cadets of the Military Institute of Taras Shevchenko Kyiv National University.
original:
Forwarded from: Educational Center of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine
Shevchenko Quest at the Educational Center The Educational Center held an educational event for the 210th anniversary of the birth of Taras Shevchenko and the International Day of the Struggle for Women's Rights. This day is really special for us, so we decided to celebrate it in a special format and combine a meeting with a People's Deputy of Ukraine , a mini-lecture about Kobzar and a real quest for the cadets of the Military Institute of Taras Shevchenko Kyiv National University! People's Deputy of Ukraine Yuliya Ovchynnikova spoke sincerely and frankly with the cadets, noting the role of the Parliament in the struggle of the Ukrainian people for freedom - and the inspiration they provide in this struggle the words of Veliky Kobzar, and also answered their questions. Director of the Museum of the Historical Center of Kyiv, Nataliya Klymenko, told the participants of the event about the most interesting moments of Shevchenko's life - and even showed archival documents. And then the cadets took part in the Shevchenko Quest, developed by OCse specialists, which consisted of stages to mark Kobzar's spheres of activity: literature, visual arts, history and the philosophical basis of parliamentarism, as well as a part devoted to his participation in the secret Cyril-Methodiev brotherhood. Having passed all the stages of the quest and received the necessary hints, the teams fiercely competed at the last stage - entering the secret code, and the winning team received valuable prizes from OCse! We thank all the guests of the event and wish everyone a happy holiday!

location: Tel Aviv, Tel Aviv District, Israel

description: Valery Ilyich Rozhdestvensky, a military shipbuilding engineer and diver, was recruited as a cosmonaut, breaking the traditional pilot-only recruitment. He made history as the first and only diver to fly into space, even making a splashdown, a testament to his maritime background.
original:
How a diver flew into space.

Traditionally, in the USSR, pilots were recruited to become cosmonauts. But one day they chose not a pilot, but a diver as an astronaut; not all pilots go into outer space. And indeed there is a lot of maritime romance in space: a space plane, not a ship, but a ship, the depths of space, the starry ocean. Moreover, by the will of fate, it was the diver-cosmonaut who made the only splashdown in the history of Russian cosmonautics. Even from space, the sea elements did not let go of the sailor.
The first and so far only diver who made a space flight was named Valery Ilyich Rozhdestvensky. He was born in Leningrad in 1939. He graduated from the Higher Naval Engineering School, was a military shipbuilding engineer, completed diver courses in 1962 and was the leader of the diving team of the emergency rescue service. He worked in the Baltic, descended to depths of up to 200 meters. I didn’t even think about a career as an astronaut.

event: Romania Wins Lawsuit Against Roșia Montană Gold Corporation
description: Romania unexpectedly won a lawsuit against Roșia Montană Gold Corporation, controlled by Canadian company Gabriel Resources, regarding gold mining in a protected area in Alba County. The Romanian government was initially expected to pay $6.7 billion but only had to cover costs of $1,437,574.01.
original:
A sensation occurred yesterday in international arbitration in Washington.

Romania, contrary to all forecasts of the government in Bucharest, won a lawsuit against Roșia Montană Gold Corporation, controlled by the Canadian company Gabriel Resources, on the issue of gold mining in the Carpathians in a protected area in Alba County.

The investor tried to recover $6.7 billion from Bucharest, but in the end the Romanian side only had to cover costs of $1,437,574.01.

It must be said that almost all high-ranking officials were preparing for the worst - Prime Minister Marcel Ciolacu even proposed, in order to avoid payment, to hold a national referendum on the issue of gold mining and only after that consider paying off the claim. Along the way, they wanted to tear apart former Prime Minister Dacian Ciolos, under whom the mining zone received international environmental status, which prompted the investor to file a lawsuit, since the Romanian government deliberately made subsoil exploration impossible.

It worked out. On the tip of a knife, Romania slipped through a situation that could have turned into a serious financial crisis.Digi24România câștigă procesul Roșia Montană. Gabriel Resources trebuie să plătească s...Curtea de Arbitraj Comercial Internațional de la Washington a dat, vineri, verdictul în cazul situației aurului de la Roșia Montană. România a câștiga...
